text: Bound pronominals in European Portuguese are examined which challenge the dichotomy established in clitic analysis where clitics are formally described either at the morphological level as lexical affixes , or at the syntactic level in terms of linearization .Clitics in European Portuguese occupy a transitional place between morphology and syntax .
